distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for expat fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-52425: Fixed a DoS caused by processing large tokens. (bsc#1219559) 
- CVE-2024-28757: Fixed an XML Entity Expansion. (bsc#1221289)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows a denial of service (resource consumption) because many full reparsings are required in the case of a large token for which multiple buffer fills are needed.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: libexpat through 2.6.1 allows an XML Entity Expansion attack when there is isolated use of external parsers (created via XML_ExternalEntityParserCreate).
notes.title: CVE description
